snippet: Tiffany Tyler and her young son were once evicted by city marshals and lived in a shelter. Now that she has her own apartment, she is determined never to repeat the past.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York, a beneficiary of the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Tiffany Tyler pay off her back rent.
lead_paragraph: Tiffany Tyler and her young son were once evicted by city marshals and lived in a shelter. Now that she has her own apartment, she is determined never to repeat the past.

headline.seo: A Mother Grateful to Have a Key to Her Own Place
